sentences.sContent: When this happens, the cholesterol and protein form a lipoprotein together.
sentences.sContent_eng: When this happens, the cholesterol and protein form a lipoprotein together.
sentences.sCn: 当这种结合发生时，胆固醇和蛋白质共同形成了脂蛋白。

sentences.sContent: Garlic: garlic can increase of high density lipoprotein in blood, to prevent arteriosclerosis advantage.
sentences.sContent_eng: Garlic: garlic can increase of high density lipoprotein in blood, to prevent arteriosclerosis advantage.
sentences.sCn: 大蒜：大蒜可升高血液中高密度脂蛋白，对防止动脉硬化有利。

remMethod.val: lipo(脂) + protein(蛋白质) → 脂蛋白

trans.tranOther: any of a group of proteins to which a lipid molecule is attached, important in the transport of lipids in the bloodstream
